item.title: Remote Setup
item.description: Setup Flask API server on remote server. Allow Web UI access from remote but do not allow run command directly on it. python3 core/app.py -b 0.0.0.0 -p 5000 or Because this API allows executing command on your server so by default it only allows execute command from localhost so if you specify --remote It’s will remove local protection on that API. python3 core/app.py -b 0.0.0.0 -p 5000 --remote Web UI connect Connect your UI to API Server.
